bike.description: Monoque High Modulus C-7 carbon with custom weave carbon strands, Integrated aluminum cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.

components.description: TruVativ Rouleur CARBON Double GXP w/ Integrated spindle, with 7075 CNC 36/50T Chainrings
Shimano Dura Ace Shifter/Brake, Flight Deck compatible
Cane Creek 1 1/8" Integrated Road, with convex hollow alloy top cap and InterLoc spacer
High Modulus C-7 carbon  stays with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger
FC-440 Fuji Carbon Monocoque Integrated 1 1/8" Carbon steerer , 420g
Ritchey Pro Alloy 31.8mm Road, Net Forged, +/-6 degree
Shimano Dura Ace shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
